attributes.action: Make the government put more funds into mental health care across the NHS
attributes.background: The Conservative Government has removed £150 million from the mental health care departments of the NHS. The Government should have to continue to fund this area and improve care in this area, as 28% of disease in the NHS is caused by mental health conditions, but is only paid with 13% of funds.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166130
